text: Smile was an American Christian free-to-air television network. It is owned and operated by the Trinity Broadcasting Network. It was aimed at children aged 2-12 and offers a mixture of children's religious and family-oriented programming. It was founded as the television branch of TBN's Smile of a Child ministry, created by TBN co-founder Jan Crouch. Category:American television channels
title: Smile (TV network)
